alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:38PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Bristol, northern Washington, Newport, southern Kent and southeastern Bristol Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 638 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Exeter, or 7 miles south of Coventry, moving east at 30 mph. Other strong storms were near Norwich, moving east. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fall River, Warwick, Coventry, South Kingstown, North Kingstown, Newport, Bristol, Portsmouth, Middletown, Narragansett, Tiverton, Westport, East Greenwich, Hopkinton, Charlestown, Richmond, Exeter, West Greenwich, Jamestown and Little Compton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for Rhode Island.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Washington; Western Kent
